H

handleCardInfoMessage(ArrayList<String>) - Method in class uno.ui.screens.PlayArea
Handles messages that contain the info about what cards the player have
The cards are provided in their string representations with a # between each individual info
handleDrawCardMessage() - Method in class uno.server.core.ServerInteractions
Draws a card for the current player and changes to the next turn
Logs the outcome
handleMessage(Player, String) - Method in class uno.server.core.ServerInteractions
Handles string messages received from the client
Makes sure that only the current player can send messages
handleMessage(Object) - Method in class uno.ui.screens.PlayArea
Handles all the messages received during a game
handlePairMessages(Pair) - Method in class uno.ui.screens.PlayArea
Handles messages that has the base object as a pair instance
The messages that uses that are when a new round is starting and when info about a played card is received
handlePlayerInfoMessage(ArrayList) - Method in class uno.ui.screens.PlayArea
Saves the lists of info about the players and updates the on screen info
handlePlayMessage(Player, String) - Method in class uno.server.core.ServerInteractions
Checks if the current player have the provided card and then executes it.
handleRequestMessage(String) - Method in class uno.ui.screens.PlayArea
Handles when a request for user input is needed from the server
handleUnoMessage() - Method in class uno.server.core.ServerInteractions
Set the 'uno' flag on the current player to true
Sends the new info about the uno status to all players
handleWildMessage(String) - Method in class uno.server.core.ServerInteractions
Gets the color of the message and sets it to the current played wild card
hashCode() - Method in class uno.network.api.Pair

hide() - Method in interface uno.ui.screens.IScreen
Hides the window from showing.
The window should either be closed or hidden here as a new screen is about to be shown.
